channel.title: Comments on: Gang of Four Sell Out to Microsoft

item.title: By: Aaron
item.dc:creator: Aaron
item.description: I see it as harmless. Their anti-consumer message was 30+ years ago and they have been for sale for many years since (look at their 80s pseudo pop or inclusion in the Marie Antoinette movie as evidence). Good for them for staying relative and keeping the royalty checks coming. Good music deserves longevity, even through a Microsoft commercial if necessary.
item.content:encoded:
I see it as harmless. Their anti-consumer message was 30+ years ago and they have been for sale for many years since (look at their 80s pseudo pop or inclusion in the Marie Antoinette movie as evidence).
Good for them for staying relative and keeping the royalty checks coming. Good music deserves longevity, even through a Microsoft commercial if necessary.

item.title: By: Eric Greenwood
item.dc:creator: Eric Greenwood
item.description: well, paraphrase, considering gang of four's entertainment was pretty much anti-consumerism, it's a little more than ironic that the band would shill for one of the world's largest corporations.
item.content:encoded: well, paraphrase, considering gang of four’s entertainment was pretty much anti-consumerism, it’s a little more than ironic that the band would shill for one of the world’s largest corporations.

item.title: By: Paraphrase
item.dc:creator: Paraphrase
item.description:
What's the big deal about "selling out"? King, Gill and co. aren't adolescents any more.
What's amazing is that music which sounded so original and abrasive 25 yrs. ago has become so unthreatening today.
item.content:encoded:
What’s the big deal about “selling out”? King, Gill and co. aren’t adolescents any more.

What’s amazing is that music which sounded so original and abrasive 25 yrs. ago has become so unthreatening today.

item.title: By: SourDove
item.dc:creator: SourDove
item.description: Don't be so hard on him. He's at a loss for words.
item.content:encoded: Don’t be so hard on him. He’s at a loss for words.

item.title: By: K
item.dc:creator: K
item.description: My thought pattern when I first saw it: a.) Holy shit! Really?! b.) I wonder what Eric is going to think c.) WTF.
item.content:encoded:
My thought pattern when I first saw it:
a.) Holy shit! Really?!
b.) I wonder what Eric is going to think
c.) WTF.

item.title: By: Eric Greenwood
item.dc:creator: Eric Greenwood
item.description: i was speechless when i saw this.
item.content:encoded: i was speechless when i saw this.
